attributes.action: Open an A&E department at Bishops Stortford hospital
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After a recent trip to Harlow from Stansted, realising it takes 15 minutes from there to the hospital. With the airport so close to Bishops Stortford, and medical emergencies do happen on planes, and every minute counts, it seems necessary to have an A&E department in Bishops Stortford
